entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add NuGet Package README file for EFcore #30467
  • Integer value 0 is not set on INSERT when field has different default value #30463

Closed

  • Explicit comparer on a nullable principal property with a non-nullable dependent property throws #28944
    8.0.0-preview3
  • using entity framework as key storage for .net data protection #30440
  • In efcore 6, Is it possible to generate migration file with table already exists or not condition.( when we run commands) #30428
  • SaveChanges sometimes fails to save added entity in multithread context - is this known/expected? #30375
  • Error when creating a new migration "An item with the same key has already been added. Key: EntityId" #30349
  • Changing log level of DbUpdateConcurrencyException #30429
    8.0.0-preview3
  • Verify No Changes Command #30457

PullRequests

Created

  • Add readme for sql server #30466
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.2 to 13.0.3 #30465
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Debugging for in-memory test failures #30460

Merged

  • Convert when using comparer for non-nullable dependent #30398
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.3.23159.20 #30462
  • Don't log both `SaveChangesFailed` and `OptimisticConcurrencyException` for same event #30445
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.32.0 to 3.32.1 #30417
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Temporary fix for in-memory test failures #30461

Updated

  • Fix to #30410 - JSON: optimize update path for single property element - don't wrap the value in json array #30422
